sections.title: Overview
sections.content: The Custom Menu Links plugin allows administrators to add external links to the navigation menu. When enabled, a 'Links' menu appears in the sidebar containing all configured links.

sections.title: Adding Links
sections.content:
To add a new link:
1. Go to the Links menu in the sidebar and click 'Manage Links'
2. Enter a display name (2-50 characters)
3. Enter the full URL (must start with http:// or https://)
4. Click 'Add Link'

The link will immediately appear in the Links menu.

sections.title: Managing Links
sections.content:
All configured links are shown in a table. You can:
- View the link name and URL
- Click the URL to test it opens correctly
- Delete links you no longer need

Links appear in the order they were added in the navigation menu.

sections.title: Security
sections.content:
For security:
- Only administrators can add or remove links
- The 'Manage Links' option only appears for administrators
- Links must use http:// or https:// protocols
- HTML tags are not allowed in names or URLs
- All input is validated and sanitized

sections.title: Use Cases
sections.content:
Common uses for custom links:
- Church website
- Online giving portal
- Volunteer signup forms
- Denomination resources
- Partner organization sites
- Cloud storage folders
- Event registration pages
